block.p: CODDINGTON-Herbert. Of Jamaica Estates, NY. Formerly of Hollis NY. On July 7, 2000, beloved husband of the late Helen. Loving father of Robert (Maruja), Nancy (Samuel) Benchimol, John (Rowena), William (Diane), David (Juliette). Dear grandfather of Edward, Elizabeth, Pamela, Michael, Andrew, John, Amy, Alissa, Erica, Peter and Janis. Great-grandfather of nine children. Interment private. Memorial service to be held at a later date. Contributions may be made to the Eye Bank of NY.
